articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: China OKs first homegrown vaccine as COVID-19 surges globally - CBS News
articles.description: Sinopharm is one of at least five Chinese developers in a global race to create vaccines for the coronavirus.
articles.content:
Beijing — China authorized its first homegrown COVID-19 vaccine for general use Thursday, adding another shot that could see wide use in poorer countries as the virus surges back around the globe.
